oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A new touch for berry and apple production in South Savo region
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kivijärvi, Pirjo
Kauppinen, Sanna
Tuovinen, Tuomo
Lindqvist, Isa
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A 3-year project (2004-2007) was designed to improve profitability and ecological sustainability of berry and apple farms in South Savo region in Finland. The aim of the project is also to enhance collaboration between researchers, advisers and farmers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kivijärvi, Pirjo; Kauppinen, Sanna; Tuovinen, Tuomo and Lindqvist, Isa (2006) A new touch for berry and apple production in South Savo region. In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 2 (10), p. 25.
